description: Uploads a local file to Google Cloud Storage

name.description: The name of the remote file to upload

type.description: The type of the remote file (in MIME notation) (default: 'application/octet-stream')

source.description: The path to a local file to upload

bucket.description: The target bucket to write the file to

project.description: The project that owns the bucket

credential.description: Path to a service account credentials file
